Are we loosing freedom on the Internet?

Author: Sebastian Wilhelm Graf

Within five years from now the internet as we know it will end. Freedom will no longer be a right, as it will be only available to those who know how to conceal themselves. The media landscape will have changed as well. But there is hope. For every step one takes towards Security one risks loosing out on privacy and usability.

But there is hope...
More at:
http://www.t-dose.org/2010/talks/freedom_internet

Technical Dutch Open Source Event.
November 7, 2010
Fontys Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2010, Are we loosing freedom on the Internet?, Sebastian Wilhelm Graf
